TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content: What's up with the forums today?

> 
> 
> 49 minutes ago, tater said:
> 
> 
> What's up with the forums today?
> 

Same i have been getting an error code 500 all day

I actually had this happen all month now.

I guess they are updating the forum?
I'm not sure what was up with the forums earlier, but it appears to be fixed- whatever it was.

> 
> 
> 13 hours ago, cyberKerb said:
> 
> 
> Was this patch ever a real one that Squad gave out at some point? I thought I remember it on a video blog or two.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Do they still unofficially award them to exceptional work / people on social media? Or are they long gone?
>

> 

I don't remember seeing that one but it's possible that it's real since they gave a similar set to us moderators for Christmas a while back. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hi

I found this idiosyncrasy on the Advanced Search:

Spoiler

![S8s29c8.png](https://i.imgur.com/S8s29c8.png)

"Curse Representative" and "New Members" are duplicated. This can be or not a problem - if this duplication is happening on the DB, you may have two different IDs for the same thing.

In time, there's a Thread for Forum bugs? I don't thing creating a new thread just for this is a productive measure.

Cheers.
Thanks for pointing this out. We'll take a look.

Dear mods,

This might be a bit silly question, I admit, but nevertheless:

I see the same mods active all the time: do you people ever sleep? Work? Eat? Have a family life?

And then: how do you find, on top of these, time to play KSP? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon2.png ":o")

> 
> 
> 6 minutes ago, VoidSquid said:
> 
> 
> And then: how do you find, on top of these, time to play KSP?
> 

Two words:

Multiple Monitors.

\*like\*
